subtitles.text: Thank you for watching.
Thank you for your time today.
Best regards.
This time, I would like to ask you again about those two songs.
So, Katsurabon-san, when you received the offer, what did you think about it?
Mr. Sugimoto said, "This is the direction that the group is going right now,
I was wondering if you could give me a song like this one. Did you ask for this kind of song?
Yes, I did. From the beginning, I was also interested in Bar Tension and Mr. Daichi's ska,
I had an image of Bar Tension and Mr. Daichi's ska and rock-oriented songs from the beginning,
When I was asked to do a song with Bar Tension and Mr. Daichi...,
Oh, I get it. Then, I wanted something energetic,
I thought, "A song that everyone can ride together and get excited at a live performance,
But then I thought, "No, actually, there's a song called Oisa that's getting a lot of buzz right now,
I was shown the music video for it,
After I saw the music video, I thought, "I see,
I was shown the music video of the song, and after I thought, "I see," I listened to my bar tension and Daichi's ska song,
I was able to listen to WatakOI's demo song,

That's right. When we were still making them before they were released to the world,

He told me that he wanted to send me the next song that would lead to the next song,

I was wondering how you would start the process of making a new song,

Melody, chord progression, tone, rhythm, etc,
melody, chord progression, tone, rhythm, and so on,

Then I start thinking about what to put on the beat and the chord progression.
For example, if it's a lingering or lonely part of a song, I'll start by thinking about what to put on it, or the chord progression,
For example, if it is a lingering or lonely part, the tempo should not be so fast, right?
Yes, that's right.

Would you like me to erase all of them? He asked me if I wanted him to turn it all off.
The beat was completely muffled, and only the voice was on the track,

It turned out to be a stoic verse.

I was surprised,

I feel like I have to challenge myself in various ways. I don't know how to say that I have to, but I wonder if it is okay to take on challenges. I guess so.
Yes, I think so. If I am not given a certain framework or theme, I am at a loss if I am asked to create completely freely.
My way of life as a writer becomes ingrained in me. If you ask me to give you a theme, I am at a bit of a loss.
If you give them a challenge, you can create a puff piece. It is easier to work with restrictions, which is why we are given such interesting settings.
If you are going to ask Kenmochi to do something, you have to prepare an interesting theme. That is possible.
So, thank you very much for sharing with us the secret stories behind the production. Thank you very much.
Will you write more Batten songs in the future? I can't say no.
I can't wait to hear what you have to say.
I am really looking forward to your future development. Thank you very much.

I look forward to receiving your continued support.
